name: RadioAid
0:
”Alexa, open radio aid”
”Alexa, ask radio aid what the title is”
”Alexa, ask radio aid what was running before”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio aid
des:
The RadioAid project supports non-profit organizations or associations in your work.
The next 24-hour live show starts on Friday, 01.11.2024 at 18:00.
In 2024, RadioAid is supporting the Munich Outpatient Children's Hospice Foundation, which cares in particular for young people with serious and life-threatening illnesses and/or disabilities. The foundation stands by those affected and their families from the time of diagnosis and supports them until after death - both in hospital and in their own homes. The help provided includes, in particular, outpatient children's hospice work, socio-medical aftercare, advice for relatives and a crisis service.

To play, simply say "Alexa, play RadioAid" or "Alexa, start RadioAid ".
You can stop playback at any time by saying "Alexa, stop".

Want more information? We offer you the following options:
Alexa, ask RadioAid what the title is
Alexa, ask RadioAid what was running before

You want more information about RadioAid? Then visit us at: www.radioaid.de

The radio stream is provided by laut.fm, the User Generated Radio™.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
